title: Camden Medical Centre Crawler
description: Web crawler for extracting specialist doctor information from Camden Medical Centre website. Configurable with request limits and optional cookie support for authenticated scraping.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: ‚úÖ Max Requests Per Crawl (REQUIRED)
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests to process. Use -1 for unlimited crawling. Recommended: 50-200 for testing, -1 for full crawl.

cookies.title: üç™ Cookies (Optional)
cookies.description: Optional array of cookies for authenticated scraping. Each cookie should be in browser extension format with fields: name, value, domain, path, secure, httpOnly, sameSite, expirationDate.

headless.title: üñ•Ô∏è Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode. Set to false for debugging, true for production.

outputFilename.title: üìÅ Output Filename (Optional)
outputFilename.description: Custom filename for the output JSON file (without .json extension). If not provided, will use default naming with date.
